column4: Hey guys, I may be female but i'm not dumb, and I can't believe that installing a pluging nor the upgrading of an app (firefox) is that hard. how about some help. I have read wiki's, installs from the mozilla site, soundforge etc and still no worky!!!
crimsum, install firefox and flash either the defualt plugin or the gplflash
my firefox is v1.02 and want to upgrade to the more recent. apt-get -u update has not worked
just use the ubuntu update manager
